episode.title: 坊ちゃんと秘密の魔法
The Duke and Secret Magic
Bocchan to Himitsu no Mahou
episode.summary: While searching the main residence, Viola stumbles upon an old servants’ logbook from around the time the Duke got cursed. When she gives it to Alice, Daleth finds out and makes a move to have it destroyed. What is it that Daleth wants kept secret? Source: Funimation
